about_the_game:
An essential BGM set for retro-style games! Made by sourcing real game machine sounds, this pack is ideal for adding a taste of authentic retro aesthetic to your game.
Features
・BGM and ME reminiscent of 8-bit games from the late 1980s to early 1990s.
・Sound sources recorded from the actual retro game hardware.
・Includes a variety of tracks from opening themes to ending themes.
・Can be combined with the previously released "Retro Game Console Sound BGM Set" to create an exciting superset of BGMs.


*******************************************
Audio: 26 tracks
Opening/title themes: 4 tracks
Menu select themes: 4 tracks
General-purpose themes: 8 tracks
Final stages/climactic themes: 2 tracks
Boss battle themes: 2 tracks
Ending theme: 1 track
ME: 5 tracks

*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
